title: Meitantei Conan: Zero no Tea Time
overview: Agent of the Public Security Bureau, member of shadowy criminal organization, private detective in training - things can get pretty complicated when you`re juggling three conflicting identities. This series about the secret life of a triple agent is based on the popular spinoff manga written and illustrated by Takahiro Arai and supervised by "Detective Conan" creator Gosho Aoyama.
